sentences.english: This is the topic we're going to do it after spring break.
sentences.chinese: 是我們春假之後會討論的問題。

sentences.english: A:What did you do over Spring Break?
Which resort shall we go to on our spring holidays?
This spring vacation, I went with some of my classmates by bus to Kenting National Park.
sentences.chinese: 今年春假，我和一些同學搭巴士到墾丁國家公園。

sentences.english: We're here for my son's vacation, spring break from school.
Really, when I think of how I started it over spring vacation.
sentences.chinese: 真的，當我想起整個春假期間怎樣着手寫這篇小說。

sentences.english: At least, he was taking it until Spring Break.
sentences.chinese: 至少在春假前他一直在上這門課。

sentences.english: The students ran wild during spring vacation.
sentences.chinese: 學生們度春假時都玩野了。

sentences.english: Two classmates, Jill and Rachel, are visiting Taipei during their spring vacation.
sentences.chinese: 吉兒和拉結兩位同學在春假期間遊覽臺北。

sentences.english: I went on a Carnival Cruise to Cozumel for my last Spring Break hurrah during college.
sentences.chinese: 我乘坐嘉年華遊輪去科祖梅爾過大學的最後一個春假。

sentences.english: Some of the school's students had recently returned from a spring break trip to Mexico.
sentences.chinese: 該校的一些學生近期曾赴墨西哥度春假。

sentences.english: A:Are you in favor of having a trip during the spring break?
College students like to live it up at the beach during spring break.
sentences.chinese: 春假期間學生都喜歡到海邊尋歡做樂。

sentences.english: Two-thirds of the women surveyed had never even been on spring break.
sentences.chinese: 三分之二受調女性甚至從來沒有過春假。

sentences.english: And the week after that is the week before spring break.
sentences.chinese: 而再過一週，就是春假前的那一週。

sentences.english: Maybe you're talking with a friend about where you should go for spring break vacation,
sentences.chinese: 假如你在跟一個朋友討論你們該去哪裏過春假。

definition: to have a holiday or vacation
foundation of a University or College/school opening/the start of a new term
(of holidays) to come to an end/end of a vacation
